China's MGI Tech, GemPharmatech defend themselves after US bill proposedChina's MGI Tech said on Sunday as an upstream equipment provider in the gene sequencing industry, its business does not involve data collection, after a proposed U.S. Biosecure Act included its name in the bill. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 08:23:48 GMT 4OW6LZGOKNK2ZNWUN4VBM3SIFU https://www.reuters.com/business/healthcare-pharmaceuticals/chinas-mgi-tech-storagepharmatech-defend-themselves-after-us-bill-propose-2024-01-28/Reuters商业医疗保健与制药
Russia’s planned gas pipeline to China faces construction delay - FTMongolian Prime Minister L. Oyun-Erdene said construction of Russia's planned new Power of Siberia-2 gas pipeline to China, which was expected to start this year, may be delayed, the Financial Times reported on Sunday. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 08:08:31 GMT FM3QOCRSZ5OELOQ6BOFJFQGXKY https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/ Russia-planned-gas-pipeline-china-faces-construction-delay-ft-2024-01-28/Reuters市场商品
China securities regulator suspends restricted share lending from MondayChina's securities regulator said on Sunday that it will fully suspend the lending of restricted shares effective from Monday, in policymakers' latest attempt to stabilise the country's stock markets following recent sharp falls. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 07:37:26 GMT KENEXPWLSFK2XPWDSLONRM子玉https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-securities-regulator-suspends-restricted-share-lending-monday-2024-01-28/Reuters可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
China, Thailand sign mutual visa waiver agreementsThailand and China agreed on Sunday to waive visa requirements for each other's nationals to facilitate travel and tourism between the two countries, hurt by COVID-19. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 05:26:19 GMT ZYRZFOOOWVOS3B4DMG2PIW2XQQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/thailand-china-sign-mutual-visa-waiver-agreements-2024-01-28/Reuters世界亚太地区
India pivots away from Russian arms, but will retain strong tiesIndia is seeking to distance itself from its largest arms supplier after Russia's ability to supply munitions and spares was hobbled by the war in Ukraine, but must step carefully to avoid pushing Moscow closer to China, Indian sources said. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 02:02:13 GMT C42J2N26XZPUFBH2YKHZDVUDJU https://www.reuters.com/world/india/india-pivots-away- Russian-arms-will-retain-strong-ties-2024-01-28/Krishn Kaushik世界印度
Top U.S., Chinese officials talk Taiwan, Iran in BangkokTop Chinese and U.S. officials held candid talks in Bangkok aimed at lowering tensions between the superpowers on Taiwan and other subjects, ahead of an expected springtime call between President Joe Biden and Chinese leader Xi Jinping. Sat, 27 Jan 2024 15:06:18 GMT 2LPNBGSYXBORPIPWNR6UCURNYY https://www.reuters.com/world/chinas-wang-says-taiwan-issue-biggest-threat-who-us-ties-2024-01-27/Chayut Setboonsarng, Liangping Gao, Trevor Hunnicutt世界
